amendment.description: Amendment increases Veterans Employment and Training funding by $3.8 million and reduces State Unemployment Insurance and Employment Service Operations funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for administration of Veteran's Services Employment Training by $3,800,000. Funds appropriated for State Unemployment Insurance and Employment Service Operations would be reduced comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stump amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
